name: Bannings at Number 14

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had two nights at Number 14 and were very impressed. Provided you don't need any public lounge or bar areas, this B&B has everything you could want and more than you would expect. Our room was small but very thoughtfully furnished and equipped, and very comfortable. The breakfasts were excellent and the owners very welcoming. The location was ideal for us, and although a little distance from the Town centre, we (reasonably fit seniors) found it easily walkable to most central locations including the main station. Free Wi-Fi was a bonus.
reviews.title: Hard to beat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Myself and my husband had a wonderful three nights staying here. Lovely room (number 2), fantastic breakfast and very welcoming hosts. Really clean, close to seafront and wouldn't hesitate to stay here again. Lots of advice and helpful information from the owners, about Brighton as we have never been before it was really appreciated. Thank you Terry and Chris for a lovely stay.
reviews.title: wonderful b and b

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Being in the hospitality industry myself I find I'm always looking for attention to detail , I certainly was not disappointed this place is fantastic. Clean , Comfortable , Welcoming and a gorgeous cooked breakfast . My husband ran the marathon and they were so attentive , No 14 has an excellent location right by the seafront lots to do lots to see fantastic place you won't be sorry. As for Chris and Terry your love them as did I !
reviews.title: Simply gorgeous

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for two nights. A birthday treat from my lovely husband. We had never visited Brighton before and could not have chosen a better introduction than to be guests of Terry and Chris. Such lovely owners, friendly, informative, interested and kind. The accommodation is so clean, our bed was very comfortable and everything was provided. Breakfast was well cooked and any request catered for. All in all a great success. We loved Brighton and any planned return will include a stay at Bannings.
reviews.title: Would happily recommend this lovely Guest House

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for 2 nights and both me and my partner were extremely pleased with our stay!
reviews.title: Fantastic Accomodation & Owners

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at number 14 whilst visitng Brighton to watch our friend in the marathon. The B&B was deffinitly a 4* AA rating, done to a high standard with great rooms and all the facilities you would need for a weekend. Excellent location and so close to the sea front. Chris and Terry were excellent hosts, extremely friendly and helpful. Breakfast was amazing, the best cooked breakfast iv had in a long time (and even a fantastic veggie option). Would deffinitly recommend.
reviews.title: Excellent B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We wanted a quality weekend away and had that and more. Bannings was just wonderful. The room was clean, had everything we could want and so much more and did not even expect. Chris and Terry were simply charming, friendly and great hosts. Breakfast was perfect - the choice exceptional. Wish we could have stayed longer to try it all.
reviews.title: Fantastic - simply brilliant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had such a wonderful time, we are now going to book another break with them in May.
reviews.title: perfect b&b for a perfect weekend!
Excellent!
reviews.text: Chris and Terry give so much it set them apart from so many other places we have stayed at over the years throughout the UK. When you find a gem like this, why look for anything else - this had it all and more.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at number 14 for 3 nights at the beginning of april 2013. we came for a really relaxing weekend and number 14 certainly gave us that! our room was really great and the king size bed we had was incredibly comfy - we had 3 great nights sleep! breakfast each morning was really tasty, a selection of cereals, fruit, yoghurts etc is avaliable followed by a freshly cooked to order full english (veggie avaliable too). the breakfast is a great size and delicious, it will definitely set you up for the day.
reviews.title: Brilliant B & B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Had a great great time! Stayed in room 3 which was a little small but perfect. The B&B was *very* clean and bed was SOOOO comfortable. Loads of pillows, great sheets, and the perfect height. :)
reviews.title: A picky New York says: Look no further!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location was great as well being just meters from the ocean. Step out and look right and there is was.
reviews.title: Marathon Stay 2013

reviews.text: Hosts were also super nice. Helped me carry my luggage up the stairs and called cabs for us. Gave restaurant recommendations etc etc
reviews.title: The Perfect B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was also great, sausage and bacon were tasty! :)
reviews.title: Just as perfect as ever!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I really cant find any fault in our stay al all. Next time I would go for the room next to room 3 as it was a bit bigger.
reviews.title: Perfect stay in Brighton

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just spent 2 nights at the Bannings over the Easter Weekend, and what a nice place to stay. Very comfortable rooms, and the best full english breakfast I have ever had. Also such a nice touch to receive chocolate easter bunnies on our table at breakfast on Easter Sunday. Chris and Terry were the perfect hosts, there if you required anything. We will definitly stay again.
reviews.title: Bannings at Number 14

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A friendly welcome, a fresh, hearty breakfast, a huge bed in a cosy, well-appointed room - we had a truly lovely time. The room wasn't enormous, but it was so comfortable. The owners really looked after us, and to top it off it's 1 minute from the sea. I highly recommend Number 14 Rooms.
reviews.title: Top quality, cosy B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were in Brighton for a couple of nights over Easter to visit my son who lives there and picked our B&B based on previous posts on here . No one is exaggerating believe me, the experience was every bit as good as we'd hoped for and more.
reviews.title: Top Notch B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Immaculately clean and stylish and Terry & Chris are superbly friendly and engaging, The breakfast is every bit as good as previous guests have said, not just quantity but perfectly cooked and presented too and what made it for us was them letting my son Jamie join us for breakfast even though he wasn't staying - a step up from his usual bowl of Rice Crispies !!
reviews.title: yet again five star service, breakfast and rooms

reviews.text: Nice personal touches - welcome reminders on chalkboards to put our clocks forward as we went upstairs after a night out on Saturday, and the amusing delight of finding an Easter Chocolate Bunny on the breakfast table on Sunday morning.
reviews.title: A Wonderful B&B

description: A small and very clean guesthouse, we have 5 en-suite double rooms. Very close to all the city's conference venues and shopping centre.
